title: Burning Elliptical HIIT Workout for Beginners + How to Use Effectively
description:
Learn everything from how to safely and effectively use your elliptical and follow along to this burning beginner HIIT workout! 

Burning Elliptical HIIT Workout for Beginners + How to Use Effectively
Workout Length: 15 Min
Workout Level: Beginners
Trainer: Sydney Eaton 

WORKOUT DESCRIPTION
You’ve just finished unboxing your new elliptical…now what? Join Sunny Trainer Sydney for this Intro to Ellipticals class. In this class, you’ll learn everything from how to safely and effectively use your machine and complete your first workout on your machine. This workout is designed for beginners and a great way to get a feel for the resistance, and different speeds and intensities while using your elliptical! 

WORKOUT DETAILS
🔥 0:00 | Intro
🔥 0:17 | Instructional How To Pointers
🔥 0:39 | Pointers for Mounting: Footplate at lowest position, handlebar for stability
🔥 0:58 | Pointers for Feet: Remain flat on footplates if ankle mobility allows, this will reduce pressure on ankle and knee joints
🔥 1:40 | Pointers for Core: Tight core, engaged and active throughout your workout
🔥 2:16 | Pointers for Posture: Stacked head to toe, not leaning back, or slouching forward 

WARMUP
🔥 3:10 | Warmup: Resistance 1 – 60 sec

JOG & SPRINT INTERVALS
🔥 4:37 | Jog: Resistance 2 – 40 sec
🔥 5:21 | Sprint: Resistance 2 – 20 sec
🔥5:37 | Jog: Resistance 3 – 40 sec
🔥6:16 | Sprint: Resistance 3 – 20 sec
🔥 6:39 | Jog: Resistance 4 – 40 sec
🔥 7:24 | Sprint: Resistance 4 – 20 sec
🔥 7:45 | Jog: Resistance 5 – 40 sec
🔥 8:20 | Sprint: Resistance 5 – 20 sec
🔥 8:39 | Jog: Resistance 6 – 40 sec
🔥 9:16 | Sprint: Resistance 6 – 20 sec
🔥 9:38 | Jog: Resistance 5 – 40 sec
🔥 10:17 | Sprint: Resistance 5 – 20 sec
🔥 10:36 | Jog: Resistance 4 – 40 sec
🔥 11:18 | Sprint: Resistance 4 – 20 sec
🔥 11:37 | Jog: Resistance 3 – 40 sec
🔥 12:19 | Sprint: Resistance 3 – 20 sec
🔥 12:37 | Jog: Resistance 2 – 40 sec
🔥 13:19 | Sprint: Resistance 2 – 20 sec

COOLDOWN
💨 13:37 | Cooldown: Resistance 1 – 60 sec

END WORKOUT


Subscribe for more videos on health, fitness, and the latest in-home fitness equipment. 

--------------------------------------------

channelDescription:
Fit for Everyone | At Sunny Health & Fitness, we believe a quality workout experience and healthy lifestyle should be within reach of anyone who wants it. Our mission is to make fitness accessible to everyone, including you!

Sunny Health & Fitness is dedicated to helping you reach your goals. We have provided the equipment to everyday households for over a decade and now we are branching out to provide videos on technique, assistance, and customized workouts for each category in our line of premier fitness equipment. 

Subscribe to our channel to discover the latest in home fitness, weekly exercises, and product troubleshooting guides. Visit our website to discover articles and workouts and take a trip to our social media for daily updates on all things health and fitness.

comments: I really like ur workouts. I'm following u on Ur workout for treadmil with incline. They are so good. I get sweat a lot from Ur workouts. Thanks
thank you sydney for the workout! and also for including time stamps ☺️
Excellent video, by the way.  Very encouraging.

Your video is a motivation for buying an elliptical. I REALLY need to lose some weight and working from home, being almost like a bat, I feel like the only way to do it is following your routine. Thank you, hopefully it will be installed in my home in the following weeks
Elliptical seems quite a bit harder to me even on beginner level than the advanced walk on treadmill I did ealier this week. Nice!
